title: Threadslike font

comments.content:
Abril comes close, but isn't quite right (the serifs, the terminals):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/abril/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131726/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/abril/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/abril/")
Thanks! but isn't quite right like you said.

Ah, asked and answered here:

[http://typophile.com/node/116567](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131726/http:/typophile.com/node/116567 "http://typophile.com/node/116567")
